Notes: 5.3 CP1228 replaces the previous B1225.  Customers may upgrade from any 5.3 build 1225 or below to the latest CP1228. Please note that all versions of Trend Micro Deep Discovery Director 5.1 SP1 and below have officially reached End-of-Life (EOL) and no patch will be made available.

Product: Fabric Composer (AFC) and Plexxi Composable Fabrice Manager (CFM)
